I have an idea for a Zed rework

**Passive**-(Added effect)Zed players now unable to speak in chat
**Q**-New global sound effect "LCSBIGPLAYS!" on cast
**W**-Still increases his AD with each level however it now decreases max health by the same amount after all being a mechanical god who needs health
**E**-(New effect)To represent the pain and suffering Zed feels from the darkness and power within his E will now apply the damage it deals to enemies to him also
**R**-(New passive)Zeds true power has been unlocked however the darkness within him will now manifest blocking screen vision with shadow up to 80% blocked at rank 3

I think this is very good for rework Riot should hire me
Why would Zed need a rework?
I hope not ahah Zeds kit is good as it is, he may need some dmg nerfing due to the qss changes but i think his kit is good

Not that I am aware of. [The next champs in line for a rework are Ryze and Yorick](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule).

However, it is possible that he may get some slight changes in the next year or so, with 
another class rework rumoured to be happening at the end of the year, [with assassins like Zed looking like a good choice for that round.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Ht0BVKL6-meddler-if-i-may-ask?comment=000200010000)
